column3: str

<UIForeground>F201FC</UIForeground><UIGlow>F201FD</UIGlow> Quest Sync<UIGlow>01</UIGlow><UIForeground>01</UIForeground>
The chipper pixie looks at you playfully.
Speak with the chipper pixie.
Use the spyglass to count the number of pixies.
Report to the chipper pixie.
Speak with the chipper pixie.
Oh, to have so many mortals visiting us... I can scarcely contain my excitement!
I know a really fun game! Come with me, and we'll have oodles of fun together!
There you are! Here, I will lend you this tube.
A spyglass, I believe you mortals call it, and it makes small things look big. We're going to use it for our game.
The rules are simple: stand over there, look through the spyglass, and count the pixies. If you get our number right, I'll give you a fabulous prize!
Inspect the designated location to look through the spyglass and begin counting pixies.
You will have thirty seconds to complete the task, after which you may give your answer to the chipper pixie.
Stand over there, look through the spyglass, and count the pixies. There's nothing to it!
Done counting, are you? So, how many of us are there?
How many pixies are there?
One.
Three.
Four.
Are you sure? Really, truly, <Emphasis>absolutely</Emphasis> sure? Because if you aren't, you should check again!

Correct, there are four of us! Well done, mortal! Here's the fabulous prize I─
...Oh, fiddlesticks, I left it back at Lydha Lran!
Well, we'll just have to make a game of it. Last one back to the village is a rotten egg!
Tee hee, beat you back! I get to turn you into a rotten egg!
...Oh, I jest, I jest! I won't turn you into a rotten egg─not so soon after you played with me, at any rate. Here's your prize. Let's play again soon!
